H0.text: What company advertised itself with the slogan “We’ll leave a light on for you”. Best Western

H1.text: What company advertised itself with the slogan “We’ll leave a light on for you”. Hampton Inn

H2.text: What company advertised itself with the slogan “We’ll leave a light on for you”. Comfort Inn

H3.text: What company advertised itself with the slogan “We’ll leave a light on for you”. Motel6

A4.text: Beginning in 1986, Motel 6 has advertised through radio commercials featuring the voice of writer and National Public Radio commentator Tom Bodett, with the tagline 'We'll leave the light on for you.'
